meanings.definition: The quality or state of being coordinated.
meanings.sent1: Her coordinatenesses in dance class impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The team's coordinatenesses on the project led to its success.
meanings.sent3: The coordinatenesses of the synchronized swimmers made the audience cheer.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra, the coordinatenesses of the musicians created a beautiful symphony.
meanings.sent5: The coordinatenesses of the traffic flow made the city run smoothly.

meanings.definition: The ability to work together in a harmonious way.
meanings.sent1: Their coordinatenesses in the kitchen resulted in a delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: The coordinatenesses of the choir singers produced a lovely melody.
meanings.sent3: The coordinatenesses of the ants carrying food amazed the observers.
meanings.sent4: The coordinatenesses of the dancers on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The coordinatenesses of the birds flying in formation was a sight to behold.
